content: this crochet pattern is very easy to follow and creates the most beautiful and easy scrunchie with a lovely feminine vibe it s super beginner friendly and can be made up in the space of just over an hour this unique scrunchie features the v_stitch which makes this scrunchie very delicate and feminine too this pattern is 6 pages long and features photographs and in depth explanations on how to crochet this scrunchie a full length video tutorial is also linked in the pattern for this project you will need 1 skein of scheepjes organicon in shade pink petunia or any other yarn in a fingering/4 ply weight such as paintbox cotton 4 ply a 3 mm crochet hook a tapestry needle a pair of scissors 1 basic elastic band medium thickness sewing pins optional this pattern is written in us terms with british terms in brackets this is a great project for beginners pattern will be available for instant download upon payment for extra help you can message me i always answer within 24 hours happy crochet and thank you for stopping by
